name: Foundation for Development Aid ACP-EEC Asbl
goal:
Begeleiding en monitoring en controle van kleinschalige projecten op het terrein van Ontwikkelingssamenwerking.
Met name in van duurzame micro projecten in de sector met mensen met een beperking, evenals op het gebied van wederopbouw na rampen.
Support community ontwikkeling en micro financiering.
Ondersteuning opvang van vluchtelingen in Luxemburg en Nederland.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, External Relations, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Post 2015 on SDGs and Support Refugees.
Disaster reduction initiatives, off grid community developed renewable energy.
